== Linux Programming ==

=== Graphics ===
* [[DRM - Modesetting]]: Direct Rendering Manager (DRM) makes easy to talk graphics cards. Modesetting changes display modes.
* [[EGL]]: Use graphics apis (e.g OpenGL, OpenGLES)

=== Input and Events ===
* [[libudev]]: Low level linux api to get information about devices and get notified on hotplugs
* [[libinput]]: High level abstraction on udev to use input devices
